subsections.title: Policy Development and Implementation
subsections.summary: HR formulates and implements HR policies and procedures in compliance with Member laws and regulations.

subsections.title: Compliance and Legal Requirements
subsections.summary: The Coordinator ensures that the internship program adheres to legal and regulatory requirements related to internships and volunteers.

subsections.title: Role of HR and Internship Coordinator
subsections.summary: Both HR and the Internship Coordinator play vital roles in an NGO, ensuring the organization attracts and retains skilled individuals, while also providing a meaningful learning experience for interns who can contribute to the NGO's mission and projects.
